categories: Category:Star Wars: Darth Vader (2020) story arcs

nodes.text: Star Wars: Darth Vader: Into the Fire

Star Wars: Darth Vader: Into the Fire is the second and current story arc of Marvel Comics' 2020 series Star Wars: Darth Vader. The arc is written by Greg Pak and features art by Raffaele Ienco, the arc started on October 14, 2020.
